description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE ERECTION OF A PROPOSED SINGLE STOREY OUTBUILDING IN THE REAR GARDEN FOR USE INCIDENTAL TO THE ENJOYMENT OF THE DWELLINGHOUSE, ERECTION OF A HIP TO GABLE AND REAR ROOF DORMER EXTENSION AND FRONT ROOFLIGHTS ALONG WITH CHANGES TO THE FENESTRATION INCLUDING A FIRST FLOOR REAR ELEVATION JULIETTE BALCONY.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a hip to gable and rear roof dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the installation of three roof lights in the front  roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations, to alter the fenestration on the rear elevation to provide a Juliette balcony, would consist of the alteration of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The operations would consist of the erection of an outbuilding for uses incidental to that of the main house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant is advised that the Juliette balcony shown on this application is to be used solely for that purpose and not to provide means of access to any rear extension on the property for any other purpose other than repair or maintenance.

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a Lawful Development Certificate only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations.
